attributes.action: Introducing a rolling escalator on council Tax for second homes and Introduce compulsory planning consent to buy a second home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 21st century will see the equivalent of the population clearances of Scotland(which saw the native people literally thrown out, and their homes burnt) in second home hotspots in Britain. ACTION IS NEEDED AND NEEDED NOW!
In signing this petition you would be supporting a‘rolling escalator’ on council tax for second homes, cash generated would be put wholly into building houses for the local workforce. 
supporting the need for planning consent to buy a second home. 
Let the polluter pay. If you want to destroy our community's, you should have to pay for the privilege!
